name: Sprint!
description:
Sprint! is an endless runner made in Unity. You play as a brightly colored roadrunner, who has to make its way through the desert,  dodging cacti, rocks and brushes.

See how far you can come.

Upcoming Features

Or, if you want to play the upcoming multiplayer mode, get ready for some zany 4-people-1-keyboard action. Be the bird that can outrun the rest of them!

Controls
  • Right arrow key / D  - Speed up
  • Left arror key / A - Slow down
  • Space - Jump
